working on a last minute merge project, so I couldn't test it during one of the testnet merges. Could someone please confirm my understanding that blocks during the merge will be produced like this:
1. pre-merge we get normal PoW blocks with difficulty != 0 and total difficulty < TTD
2. at some point we get the last PoW block with difficulty != 0 and total difficulty >= TTD
3. and finally, all other blocks from here will have difficulty == 0 and total difficulty equal to the last PoW block
(with difficulty and total difficulty I mean whatever the JSON RPC interface gives me for blocks, I guess technically they don't exist after the merge)
